item.description:
This meetup is for developers, designers, or end-users. This month's topic of conversation will be about the changes in WordPress 3.5 which is scheduled for release in December. We will also look at the new Twenty Twelve theme which is available now and has a number of interesting features both inside and out.

Bring along your questions, too and as group we will see if we can answer them.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: October 2012 WordPress Meetup
